Fill scale constructor for lis colors

Source: R/scale_lis.R
scale_fill_lis.Rd

Fill scale constructor for lis colors

scale_fill_lis(palette = "ccvi", discrete = TRUE, reverse = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

palette

Character name of palette in lis_palettes
discrete

Boolean indicating whether color aesthetic is discrete or not
reverse

Boolean indicating whether the palette should be reversed
...

Additional arguments passed to discrete_scale() or scale_fill_gradientn(), used respectively when discrete is TRUE or FALSE

Examples

if (FALSE) {
library(unikn)
library(tidyverse)
names(lis_palettes) %>%
map(.f = ~lis_pal(., reverse = T)(10)) %>%
seecol(pal_names = names(lis_palettes))
}
